attributes.action: Award appropriate levels of compensation to service personnel injured as the result of their service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the award of £484,000 by MOD to a typist for an injury to her thumb, we request that compensation paid to service personnel for injuries sustained as a result of their service should be on a par with civilian awards.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Award appropriate levels of compensation to service personnel injured as the result of their service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14710.asp

Prime Minister's Office
